name: Embracing Escape
description:
Embracing Escape is a short half-hour visual novel.

Join our protagonist Vick, a survivor in the wastelands outside of a great cyberpunk world, as he experiences virtual reality for the first time. It’s a world full of fantasy containing everything he lacks in his current life.

Of course, nothing perfect is free, and he has to choose to either to relinquish his current life for this escapist fantasy or live in a reality that’s harsh but true.

This was made with NaniNovel in Unity with a team of 13. This game is either HTML5 for click and play or download for the .exe.

The game is a demo with only 3/5 chapters, join the discord if you want the full version when it's complete: https://discord.gg/CEdfwD2wSz
